datasets.name: 80646bd0
datasets.query:
WITH category_group AS (
  SELECT
    Aircraft,
    DateFlown,
    sentiment,
    review_category,
    review_details AS review_extructed_summaries,
    AVG(OverallRating) AS AvgRating
  FROM komae_demo_v3.airline_reviews.gd_reviews_exstracted_by_categories_all
  WHERE
    Aircraft IN (Aircraft)
  GROUP BY ALL
)
SELECT 
    Aircraft,
    DateFlown,
    sentiment,
    AvgRating,
    review_category,
    review_extructed_summaries
FROM category_group
ORDER BY
  Aircraft,
  review_category
